channel.title: Knitting on Nam Tran
channel.description: Recent content in Knitting on Nam Tran

item.title: Hello Knitting (Not World)!
item.description: I know this is a mostly technical blog, but I just wanted to say that I have taken knitting back up. I recently went home for my girlfriend’s birthday, and she wanted to have arts and crafts time with me. I told her that I used to know how to knit, so we went to Jo-Ann’s and bought one skein of yarn and 5mm needles. I’m starting to realise that knitting is a pretty intricate craft if one wants it to be.
